sn56.16:1.1: “Dharetha no tumhe, bhikkhave, maya cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti?
sn56.16:1.2: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn56.16:1.3: “aham kho, bhante, dharemi bhagavata cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti.
sn56.16:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, dharesi maya cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti?
sn56.16:2.2: “Dukkham khvaham, bhante, bhagavata pathamam ariyasaccam desitam dharemi.
sn56.16:2.3: Yo hi koci, bhante, samano va brahmano va evam vadeyya:
sn56.16:2.4: ‘netam dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam yam samanena gotamena desitam.
sn56.16:2.5: Ahametam dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam paccakkhaya annam dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam pannapessami’ti—
sn56.16:2.8: dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam khvaham, bhante, bhagavata catuttham ariyasaccam desitam dharemi.
sn56.16:2.9: Yo hi koci, bhante, samano va brahmano va evam vadeyya:
sn56.16:2.10: ‘netam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada catuttham ariyasaccam yam samanena gotamena desitam.
sn56.16:2.11: Ahametam dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam catuttham ariyasaccam paccakkhaya annam dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam catuttham ariyasaccam pannapessami’ti—
sn56.16:2.13: Evam khvaham, bhante, dharemi bhagavata cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti.
sn56.16:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, dharesi maya cattari ariyasaccani desitaniti.
sn56.16:3.3: Dukkham kho, bhikkhu, maya pathamam ariyasaccam desitam, tatha nam dharehi.
sn56.16:3.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhu, samano va brahmano va evam vadeyya:
sn56.16:3.5: ‘netam dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam yam samanena gotamena desitam.
sn56.16:3.6: Ahametam dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam paccakkhaya annam dukkham pathamam ariyasaccam pannapessami’ti—
sn56.16:3.10: dukkhanirodhagamini patipada kho, bhikkhu, maya catuttham ariyasaccam desitam, tatha nam dharehi.
sn56.16:3.11: Yo hi koci, bhikkhu, samano va brahmano va evam vadeyya:
sn56.16:3.12: ‘netam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada catuttham ariyasaccam yam samanena gotamena desitam.
sn56.16:3.13: Ahametam dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam catuttham ariyasaccam paccakkhaya annam dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam catuttham ariyasaccam pannapessami’ti—
sn56.16:3.15: Evam kho tvam, bhikkhu, dharehi maya cattari ariyasaccani desitaniti.
sn56.16:4.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhu, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
